definition: lit. wind sighing and crane calling (idiom)/fig. to panic at the slightest move/to be jittery

sentences.english: He was worried about what might happen if they leaked out information.
sentences.chinese: 他担心万一他们走漏了风声会出什么事。

sentences.english: The moonshiners had been tipped off that they were about to be raided.
sentences.chinese: 烈酒走私者得到风声说将对他们开展搜捕。

sentences.english: But banks are so gun-shy now that no one would touch us.
sentences.chinese: 但现在银行如此风声鹤唳，没有银行搭理我们。

sentences.english: On top of that, many investors were gun-shy about another Dennis comeback.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼斯再次回到交易界，这让很多投资者风声鹤唳。

sentences.english: I can hear the whisper of the wind in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 我能听到屋顶上沙沙地响的风声。

sentences.english: Then Joseph said to his brothers, "Come close to me."
sentences.chinese: 这风声传到法老的宫里，说，约瑟的弟兄们来了。

sentences.english: Anyhow, people laughing every glittering moaned, quite is lively.
sentences.chinese: 总之家家灯火辉煌，人们谈笑风声，颇是热闹。

sentences.english: You hear this whoosh and away the elevator climbs.
sentences.chinese: 在电梯爬升的时候，你听到“呼呼”的风声。

sentences.english: Then all is still save the continuous wind of the summer night.
sentences.chinese: 接着，万物俱寂，只留下夏夜不断的风声。

sentences.english: Gunshots were as common as wind gusts.
sentences.chinese: 在那里，枪战就像一阵风声那样常见。

sentences.english: An integrated 3-stage pop protection grille to guard against wind and breath noise.
sentences.chinese: 集成的3个阶段弹出保护格栅防止风声和呼吸噪音。

sentences.english: And this rumour of him went forth throughout all Judaea, and throughout all the region round about.
sentences.chinese: 他这事的风声就传遍了犹太，和周围地方。

sentences.english: Flashed by the train, the wind and the shadows are planning to be raw so.
sentences.chinese: 飞驰而过的列车把把风声和树影都划得生疼。

sentences.english: Journalists who were tipped off about the incident raced to the scene.
sentences.chinese: 事先听到有关此事风声的新闻记者争先恐后赶赴现场。

sentences.english: A guilty man apprehends danger in every sound.
sentences.chinese: 犯了罪的人对每一个声音都感到风声鹤唳。

sentences.english: Audio signal is composed in real-time through infinite variations based on wind phonographic samples and synthesis.
sentences.chinese: 听觉信号由不断变化的风声合成样本实时编辑而成。

definition: sudden clap of thunder/fig. surprising turn of events
(of a sound) to come through/to be heard/(of news) to arrive
to spring up everywhere/from all around
(onom.) sound of the wind or the breathing of sb who is sound asleep
